>Now someone should gather all the info we've got and put it somewhere
>central :)

Howabout using Sourceforge? I've heard a lot of good stuff about it, and I know one programming team (ZAngband; www.zangband.org) who's used it for a while now without any major complaints.

BTW -- Tom, thank you very much for the additional information. It's much easier to analyze the map structure now.
